description: This Java source file implements a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application, providing centralized handling for various exceptions to produce consistent JSON error responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring ControllerAdvice class that handles exceptions globally across the application to return structured JSON responses with status and message.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException, returning a 404 response with timestamp, status, error, and message.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles MethodArgumentNotValidException, returning a 400 response with validation errors per field.

methods.name: handleIllegalArgument
methods.description: Handles IllegalArgumentException, returning a 400 response with exception message.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning a 500 Internal Server Error response with a generic message.
